settings.title: Shipping Infomation
settings.content: We, Lauren & Rose, will always keep you updated about your order and make sure everything arrives safely. We offer free shipping in the USA on every order, and all parcels are securely delivered with UPS.

settings.title: Money-Back Guarantee
settings.content: We put a lot of care into what we offer, and we believe you’ll love it too. If it’s not quite what you expected, you have 30 days to return it for a full refund.

settings.title: Waterproof & Tarnish-Free
settings.content: Our jewelry is crafted with high-quality materials and designed to last for years to come. All of our stainless steel pieces are 100% waterproof and will never tarnish — made to stay as beautiful as the day you received them.

settings.subtitle: Explore Our Jewelry
settings.title: Your Last Chance
settings.text:
After years of creating meaningful, handcrafted jewelry together, Lauren & Rose Jewels will soon close its doors. Every necklace, bracelet, and ring in our collection has been lovingly designed by a mother and daughter team, celebrating stories of love, strength, and connection.

As we step into a new chapter, this is your final opportunity to own one of our signature handmade pieces. Once they’re gone, they’re gone for good - no restocks, no repeats.

Thank you for being part of our journey and supporting small, heartfelt craftsmanship.

settings.subtitle: Handcrafted Art
settings.title: Handmade with Love
settings.text:
Every piece I create is meticulously handcrafted with passion, precision, and an eye for detail. From the first sketch to the final polish, nothing is rushed, and nothing is outsourced. This is slow, intentional craftsmanship—made with high-quality materials and deep respect for the art.

Each design is unique, carrying the mark of the maker and telling a story through form, texture, and emotion. These aren’t just stylish pieces—they’re timeless keepsakes, made to be worn, cherished, and passed down.

settings.title: How can I reach you?
settings.text:
Whether you have a question or simply want to chat about our pieces, we’re available every day of the week.

🕰 Our Hours:
Mon–Fri: 9:00 AM – 6:30 PM
Sat–Sun: 10:00 AM – 5:00 PM

We do our best to reply within 24 hours, but we always strive to respond as quickly as possible.

✉️ Email us at:

settings.title: How can I return an item if I don't like it?
settings.text:
We want you to love your jewelry as much as we loved creating it.

If for any reason it’s not quite right, you’re welcome to return it within 30 days of receiving your order.

Just send us an email — we’ll make sure everything is taken care of quickly and kindly.

✉️ Email us at:

settings.title: How is your jewelry made?
settings.text:
Every piece we create is crafted with care and attention to detail.

We handpick the finest materials and personally oversee every step of the process in our workshop.

Our goal is to design jewelry that not only looks beautiful but also lasts for years to come.

settings.title: Can I change or cancel my order?
settings.text:
Can I change or cancel my order? Of course, you can change or cancel your order within 8 hours of purchase.

Please contact us immediately by e-mail atinfo@maeroseboutique.comif you wish to change or cancel your order.

settings.title: What payment methods do you accept?
settings.text: We’ve made it simple and secure for you to pay. You can use Amex, Maestro, Visa, MasterCard, Apple Pay & Google Pay, whatever works best for you.

settings.title: How can I track my order?
settings.text: You will receive a tracking number via email once your order has been shipped.

settings.title: Is your jewelry durable? Will it tarnish?
settings.text:
Our jewelry is made with high-quality materials and designed to last.

All stainless steel pieces are 100% waterproof and will never tarnish — beauty that stays with you for years to come.
